1.title: Big Papi, Soriano, Shumpert & LJ
1.plot: Iman Shumpert, David Ortiz, Larry Johnson, and Alfonso Soriano discuss hi-top haircuts, Michael Jordan's retirement, and hitting 400 home runs. Ortiz reveals the secret to having perfect walk up music.

2.title: Snoop Dogg, Bryant, Hernandez, Cano & Pierre-Paul
2.plot: Snoop Dogg, Robinson Cano, Dez Bryant, Jason Pierre-Paul, and Felix Hernandez discuss hazing, Snoop's teleprompter, and celebration in baseball. Jordan gives Snoop a facial.

3.title: Pujols, Granderson, Sheffield & Aybar
3.plot: Albert Pujols, Gary Sheffield, Erick Aybar, and Curtis Granderson talk about video reviews, playing in the AL vs. NL, and the importance of playing multiple sports. Sheffield welcome Pujols to the 500 HR club.

4.title: Sabathia, Beltran, Fielder & Stoudemire
4.plot: Cecil Fielder, CC Sabathia, Amar'e Stoudemire, and Carlos Beltran discuss fighting in sports, New York fans, and the Knick's upcoming season. Jordan gets teased for shaving athlete's legs.

5.title: Gooden, Wilkins, Parsons, Gordon & Mejia
5.plot: Dwight Gooden, Dominique Wilkins, Chandler Parsons, Dee Gordon, and Jenrry Mejia talk about Game 6 of the '86 World Series, playing basketball in Europe and sneakers in the NBA. Dodger Dee Gordon recalls starting a bench clearing brawl.

6.title: Lynch, Strawberry, Davis & Cespedes
6.plot: Marshawn Lynch, Darryl Strawberry, Eric Davis, and Yoenis Cespedes discuss playing in the Super Bowl, Bo Jackson, and the impact of social media on athletes' nightlife. Davis explains the unspoken code of old-school professional baseball.

7.title: Burress, Gomez, Rodriguez & Young
7.plot: Plaxico Burress, Carlos Gomez, Francisco Rodriguez, and Chris Young discuss trash talking, rowdy fans, and 50 Cent's ceremonial first pitch.

8.title: Wall, Bautista, Anderson & Reyes
8.plot: John Wall, Jose Bautista, Kenny Anderson, and Jose Reyes discuss steroids, going back to school, and Reyes's record label. Jordan has a slight shaving mishap.

9.title: Tuck, Rob & Chris Gronkowski, Martinez, Wells, Friedlander
9.plot: Justin Tuck, Rob Gronkowski, Pedro Martinez, David Wells, Chris Gronkowski, and Judah Friedlander discuss fighting George Steinbrenner, playing dirty in the NFL, and Ping Pong. Pedro gives Jordan a trim.

imdb.plot outline: What do your favorite athletes really talk about when no reporters are around? Where can you hear today's greatest athletes talk smack, let their opinions fly free on what's going on right now, share their most private and hilarious stories, and recount their tales of former glory with a few very special friends? Right in the BACK OF THE SHOP. Set in the back of The Bronx's very own "Jordan's Barbershop," each episode of BACK OF THE SHOP features a mix of guests that span the world of sports and entertainment. BACK OF THE SHOP doesn't have a host. It's a sports talk show driven by today's sports superstars, and drops us in to the casual conversations that sports fans have only dreamed of being a part of. And with any neighborhood barbershop, you can never be sure who might just stop by...
